venue: AMC Metreon 16, 135 4th St #3000, San Francisco, CA 94103
steps: Arrive at the AMC Metreon 16 at least 15 minutes before the movie starts.
Present your ticket at the entrance.
Find a comfortable seat for your child and set up their cushion or blanket.
Ensure your child is comfortable and provide noise-cancelling headphones if needed.
Enjoy the movie in an environment tailored for sensory needs.
safety: Ensure that all exits are familiar, and keep personal belongings secure.
